text: Heather Langenkamp (born July 17, 1962 in Tulsa, Oklahoma) is an American actress. She is best known for playing Nancy Thompson in the A Nightmare on Elm Street movies. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:A Nightmare on Elm Street Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Tulsa, Oklahoma
title: Heather Langenkamp
